Package be.brahms.rent_serve.controllers

Class CategoryController

java.lang.Object
be.brahms.rent_serve.controllers.CategoryController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/categories/") public class CategoryController extends Object
This controller manages categories Display the list of categories

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    CategoryController(CategoryService categoryService, CategoryAssembler categoryAssembler)
    This constructor is used to inject the necessary services for handling category-related request.

  • Constructor Details

    • CategoryController

      public CategoryController(CategoryService categoryService, CategoryAssembler categoryAssembler)
      This constructor is used to inject the necessary services for handling category-related request.
      Parameters:
      categoryService - the service used for category
      categoryAssembler - the assembler used to convert Category object to into CategoryDto models

  • Method Details

    • getCategories

      @GetMapping("list") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'Moderator\',\'ADMIN\')") public ResponseEntity<List<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<CategoryDto>>> getCategories()
      Get all categories from the database This method returns a list of all categories Each category is converted to a CategoryDto Each categoryDto is wrapped inside an EntityModel with HATEOAS links.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a list of category model

    • getCategory

      @GetMapping("{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'Moderator\',\'ADMIN\')") public ResponseEntity<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<CategoryDto>> getCategory(@PathVariable long id)
      This method get a category by his ID
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the category
      Returns:
      a name of category choice by his ID

    • create

      @PostMapping("new/category") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'MEMBER\',\'MODERATOR\',\'ADMIN\')") public ResponseEntity<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<CategoryDto>> create(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid CategoryForm form)
      Create a new category This method return a new category
      Parameters:
      form - The form contain data to create a new category
      Returns:
      a responseEntity with the new category

    • update

      @PutMapping("{id}/edit") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'MODERATOR\',\'ADMIN\')") public ResponseEntity<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<CategoryDto>> update(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody @Valid @Valid CategoryForm form)
      Update the category by his id

      This method allows a user with role Moderator or Admin to edit the name

      Check before update the name of category the name is already exist.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the category
      form - the new data to edit the category
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity a response to name of category edited

    • delete

      @DeleteMapping("{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") public ResponseEntity<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<CategoryDto>> delete(@PathVariable Long id)
      Delete the category.
      Parameters:
      id - the category's ID
      Returns:
      the delete category with links

    • getCategoriesForMaterial

      @GetMapping("material") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'MEMBER\', \'MODERATOR\', \'ADMIN\')") public ResponseEntity<List<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<CategoryDto>>> getCategoriesForMaterial()
      Get a list of categories .

      This method returns a list of all categories based on material. Each category is converted to a CategoryDto (Data Transfer Object). Each CategoryDto is wrapped inside an EntityModel with HATEOAS links.

      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a list of category models

    • getCategoriesForService

      @GetMapping("service") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'MEMBER\', \'MODERATOR\', \'ADMIN\')") public ResponseEntity<List<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<CategoryDto>>> getCategoriesForService()
      Get a list of categories .

      This method returns a list of all categories based on service. Each category is converted to a CategoryDto (Data Transfer Object). Each CategoryDto is wrapped inside an EntityModel with HATEOAS links.

      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a list of category models

    • searchCategoriesForMaterial

      @GetMapping("search-material/{nameCategoryMaterial}") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'MEMBER\', \'MODERATOR\', \'ADMIN\')") public ResponseEntity<List<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<CategoryDto>>> searchCategoriesForMaterial(@PathVariable String nameCategoryMaterial)
      Search categories for material
      Parameters:
      nameCategoryMaterial - the name of the material to search
      Returns:
      a list of CategoryDto models that match the material category name

    • searchCategoriesForService

      @GetMapping("search-service/{nameCategoryService}") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'MEMBER\', \'MODERATOR\', \'ADMIN\')") public ResponseEntity<List<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<CategoryDto>>> searchCategoriesForService(@PathVariable String nameCategoryService)
      Search categories for service
      Parameters:
      nameCategoryService - the name of the material to search
      Returns:
      a list of CategoryDto models that match the material category name
